Summary: object looked like big ball with big diameter at sundown
divs: Sighting Detailsit was long time since a saw it, so something i could not remember exactly. one day in a summer, my neighbor called me aloud to watch some thing in the west while i enjoyed the cool on the roofs at sundown. it was just a like a another sun which was smooth red, big ball, shining with soft light. it was hanging on the middle of the hill which was about 3 miles away. i was sure it not phosphorescenceï¼Œ for it was big. And i was sure it was not the sun, because the sun has been fallen down for about 30 minutes. and i am sure it was not imagine, for it looks like a object. it was 3 miles way from my house, i could not see it exactly. i could not remember how did i lost the sight of it. it was last for about 5 minutes and it was hanging there without moving.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Linyi
